name: Ovocnářská unie České republiky, z.s.
goal:
Union of Fruit Growers in the Czech Republic (OUČR) is professional non-governmental organisation representing more than 600 fruit-growers and fruit-tree nurserymen. It is about 70% of entities involved into professional fruit-growing sector and more than 87% of fruit - production of the Czech Republic. Membership is based on completely voluntary basis.
Our organisation have 5 regional branches, which represent the most important fruit-growing areas in the Czech Republic, and 3 special professional subunits - Association for integrated fruit-growing systems (SISPO), Fruit-tree Nurserymen Association (ŠS OUČR) and Association for Post Harvest Technologies (SSO).
Our union matches practical fruit-growing sector with legislative requirerents represented by law and responsible control and check organisations. For members we also organizes professional service like – consultations, trainings, conferences, study visits etc. Our union is also in close link with research institutions and try to introduce new modern methods and techogies into growing practise.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Education and training, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
